about_the_game:
Dreamy Weapons Bundle contains the following items:

Dreamy! Super Weapon Pack 6
Hero Bazooka, Smiley Badge G, Elder Sister Scarf, Championship Medal

Love! Super Weapon Pack 7
Meow Meow Punch, Super Sage Wrap, Guerrilla King Guard, Cool Chick's Book, Smarty-pants PC

Heaven! Super Weapon Pack 8
Airhead Tree, School Bloomers

Intense! Super Weapon Pack 9
Golden King Mallet, 7 World Beads

Deity! Super Weapon Pack 10
Green Onion Blade, Utopian Earrings

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.13GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 512Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 1GB RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
